content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Saler
(
    OrderID INT,
    OrderDate DATE,
    OrderSource NVARCHAR(50),
    CustomerDevice NVARCHAR(50),
    DeliveryAddress NVARCHAR(100),
    ProductID INT,
    OrderQuantity INT

)
WITH
(
   LOCATION = 'jsoncontainer/sales.json',
   DATA_SOURCE = [OlamideLakeDataSource],
   FILE_FORMAT = [OlamideJsonFormat]
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT OlamideJsonFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '0x0',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    )
);
